amendment.description: Amendment reduces, then increases the funding for the Water and Related Resources account by $3 million for the purpose of allowing the Bureau of Reclamation more flexibility in providing conservation measures and water stabilization in areas such as the Arkansas Valley Conduit.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce and then increase funding for the Water and Related Resources account by $3 million for the purpose of addressing the Arkansas Valley Conduit.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gardner amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gardner amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A014) offered by Mr. Gardner.
